definitions: A very large solitary cat with a yellow-brown coat striped with black, native to the forests of Asia but becoming increasingly rare.
Used to refer to someone fierce, determined, or ambitious.
A dynamic economy of one of the smaller East Asian countries, especially that of Singapore, Taiwan, or South Korea.
A person with an insatiable appetite for something.
Used in names of tiger moths and striped butterflies, e.g. scarlet tiger, plain tiger.
